pt.iul.poo.image

Class MovingImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.iul.poo.image.SimpleImage
      • pt.iul.poo.image.MovingImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DisplayableElement>, DisplayableElement, Movable

    public class MovingImage
extends SimpleImage
implements java.io.Serializable, Movable
    Moving image
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovingImage(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates an image from an image file that will be displayed in the origin coordinate (0,0) when sent to a display window.
      MovingImage(java.lang.String fileName, int x, int y)
      Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.
      MovingImage(java.lang.String fileName, int x, int y, int priority)
      Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void move(int x, int y)
      Movement for the x and y axis
      void move(java.awt.Point displacement)
      Movement to be saved for the x and y axis (will overwrite another movement, if both are to be executed, SimpleImage.update() must be called before move())
      void setPosition(java.awt.Point position)
      Direct setter for the position of the figure

      • Methods inherited from class pt.iul.poo.image.SimpleImage

        compareTo, display, getDimension, getImage, getPosition, getPriority, isValid, update

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovingImage

        public MovingImage(java.lang.String fileName)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an image from an image file that will be displayed in the origin coordinate (0,0) when sent to a display window.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Image file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • MovingImage

        public MovingImage(java.lang.String fileName,
           int x,
           int y)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Image file
        x - x axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        y - y axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • MovingImage

        public MovingImage(java.lang.String fileName,
           int x,
           int y,
           int priority)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Image file
        x - x axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        y - y axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        priority - controls the priority of the image, images with higher priority can superimpose images with lower priority
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
